name: plan_blog_post
description: Plan the structure, outline, and content strategy for the blog post. Call this first to establish the post structure before generating images or writing content.

title.description: SEO-optimized blog post title that includes the target keyword (60-70 characters ideal)

meta_description.description: Compelling meta description for search engines (150-160 characters) that includes the target keyword

tone.description: The writing tone/voice for this blog post

target_audience.description: Who is this blog post written for? (e.g., 'marketing professionals', 'small business owners', 'beginners')

outline.description: Detailed outline of blog sections with descriptions

heading.description: Section heading (will be H2 in the blog)

content_description.description: What content will be covered in this section

needs_image.description: True if this section would benefit from a generated image

image_description.description: Description of the image needed (if needs_image is true)

key_takeaways.description: 3-5 key takeaways readers should get from this post

estimated_word_count.description: Estimated word count for the complete post (should be 3000+)
